title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI in Action: How Companies Unlock Global Value & Fuel Growth (GBL205)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI 实战：企业如何释放全球价值并推动增长 (GBL205)
abstract: Discover how Tuya, Lark and Deloitte China leverage AWS Generative AI capabilities to drive innovation globally. Tuya leverages AWS Bedrock and Amazon SageMaker to power smart home innovations and optimize operations globally, reducing ML model deployment time from months to weeks. Lark showcases enterprise AI features powered by AWS Generative AI infrastructure and serve thousands of customers with DeepSeek integration. Deloitte China leverage AWS China's Generative AI solutions, empowers 10,000+ employees with AI capabilities and serves multinationals as a CAC-approved solution.
abstract_cn: 了解涂鸦智能、飞书和德勤中国如何利用AWS生成式AI能力在全球推动创新。涂鸦智能利用AWS Bedrock和Amazon SageMaker为智能家居创新提供支持并在全球范围内优化运营，将机器学习模型部署时间从数月缩短至数周。飞书展示了由AWS生成式AI基础设施支持的企业AI功能，并通过DeepSeek集成为数千客户提供服务。德勤中国利用AWS中国的生成式AI解决方案，为10,000多名员工赋能AI能力，并作为CAC批准的解决方案为跨国企业提供服务。

presenter.name: Xavier WANG
presenter.title: Sr. Mgr SSA AWS Greater China

presenter.name: Jason Wang
presenter.title: Chief AI Architech
presenter.company: Hangzhou Tuya Information Technology Co., Ltd.
